custom-sql.sql: select (sum(el.price) / 100) выручка from purchases p join purchasetype pt on pt.purchasetype_id = p.purchasetype_id join electronics el on p.electronic_id = el.electronic_id where pt.name='Наличные'

select count(*) from purchases p join electronics el on el.electronic_id = p.electronic_id join electrotype et on et.electrotype_id = el.electrotype_id where et.name='Аудиотехника' and (p.purchase_date >= date_trunc('month', current_timestamp - interval '1 month') and p.purchase_date < date_trunc('month', current_timestamp))

select em.employee_id, em.name, em.lastname, em.midname, em.birthdate, em.sex, em.position_id from employees em join (select p.employee_id, count(p.employee_id) cnt from purchases p where p.electronic_id in (select el.electronic_id from electronics el join electrotype et on et.electrotype_id = el.electrotype_id where et.name = 'Смартфоны' and el.price <= 1000000) group by p.employee_id order by cnt desc limit 1 ) mx on mx.employee_id = em.employee_id
